REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1135 reute r f BC-PHLCORP-<PHX>-HAS-BRE 03-26 0065

TEXT.TITLE: PHLCORP <PHX> HAS BREAKEVEN RESULTS
TEXT.BODY: PHLCORP Inc said for November 14 through December 31, its first reporting period after emerging from reorganization proceedings, it earned 86,000 dlrs on revenues of 47 mln dlrs, excluding 2,300,000 dlrs in gains on the sale of real estate and 800,000 dlrs in tax credits. The company is the successor to Baldwin-United Corp. Reuter
